reuters.title: TRICO <TRO> GETS CHINESE CONTRACT
reuters.body: Trico Industries Inc said it has received a six mln dlr contract to supply hydraulic lift equipment for heavy crude oil production for the Chinese Ministry of Petroleum Industry. The company said the equipment is for use in the Laiohe oilfield 350 miles northeast of Peking and will equip a 140-well program. Reuter 
